T02D2115:155a-0: @155a ` // bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2115:155a-1: sngags pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pas zhag bdun ro'i rab gnas bya ste /
T02D2115:155a-3: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba //
T02D2115:155a-4: mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog / gsung ngo //
T02D2115:155a-5: shi ba sbyang ba bstan te /
T02D2115:155a-6: dkyil 'khor cho ga rdzogs bya ste //
T02D2115:155a-7: zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du bya //
T02D2115:155a-8: khro bo de la 'og tu bya'o //
T02D2115:155a-9: thig gdab tshon gyi cho ga bya //
T02D2115:155a-10: dkyil 'khor dbus su bum pa gtsang ma la ras kha tshar ma nyams pas mgul chings bya /
T02D2115:155a-15: dkyil 'khor gyi zur bzhir mda' bzhi la dar sna
T02D2115:155a-16: lnga btags la gzhag / gshin bum mgul chings sngon
T02D2115:155a-18: de nas dri ma bca' ste /
T02D2115:155a-19: dri ma la mtshan byang btags la /
T02D2115:155a-20: gdugs dang dar sna dang me long btags la gzhag go //
T02D2115:155a-21: de nas bgegs bskrad pa ni las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas shing nyungs kar phyogs bzhir gtor ro //
T02D2115:155a-22: de nas bgegs mthong ba rnams la phyi'i gtor ma btang la bden pa bdar te 'di skad do //
T02D2115:155a-31: gang gi lag na yod kyang rung ste ;
T02D2115:155a-32: khyed la glud gtor rin po ches brgyan pa 'bul gyis /
T02D2115:155a-33: 'di ba zhes la gson gyi tshel ma gnod /
T02D2115:155a-34: gshin gyi bla ma bcad par rnal 'byor pa'i bka'
T02D2115:155a-35: la nyon cig / de skad byas la las rgyu
T02D2115:155a-37: gtor ma sngags drug phyag rgya drug gis byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2115:155a-38: bgegs dma' ba rnams la pho nya dgye /
T02D2115:155a-41: de ltar byas la dri ma la bla yang yang dgug go //
T02D2115:155a-42: de nas til la sdig pa'i gzugs byas la che 'das kyi sdig pa 'di la bstims /
T02D2115:155a-43: de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya /
T02D2115:155b-0: dus gsum du mchod pa dang gtor ma cha gsum @155b gtong ngo //
T02D2115:155b-1: dug sbyang ba ni de yang dag par byed cing sdig sel ba zhes so //
T02D2115:155b-3: bum pa'i nang du chu dang sman dang /
T02D2115:155b-4: spos lnga la sogs pa blugs la /
T02D2115:155b-5: bum pa'i khar padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dkar po cig bsams la /
T02D2115:155b-7: dpal ldan sangs rgyas padma skyes //
T02D2115:155b-9: de'i steng du aa las 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' bsgom mo //
T02D2115:155b-11: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //
T02D2115:155b-13: de la dza:h'um bam ho:sa ye shes pa dgug gzhug bya /
T02D2115:155b-14: las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas /
T02D2115:155b-15: 'jam dpal gyi gsang gnas nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun
T02D2115:155b-16: byung nas bum pa dkar mer gyis khengs par bsam
T02D2115:155b-17: mo // de nas khrus byas te /
T02D2115:155b-18: me long nang du mtshan byang gsal bar byas la /
T02D2115:155b-19: aa 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum //
T02D2115:155b-21: sangs rgyas bden pas dug mi mnga' //
T02D2115:155b-22: sangs rgyas bden pas dug bcom mo //
T02D2115:155b-23: chos dang dge 'dun yang de bzhin du sbyar ro //
T02D2115:155b-24: sa ni dug gi pha yin te //
T02D2115:155b-25: sa ni dug gi ma yang yin /
T02D2115:155b-26: bden pa'i bden tshig 'di brjod pas //
T02D2115:155b-27: tshe 'das dug ni dug med shog / las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis khrus dus gsum du bya'o //
T02D2115:155b-28: zhag bdun pa'i tha ma la phyir mi dag par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2115:155b-30: phyogs bzhir phyin la 'di skad do //
T02D2115:155b-31: tshe 'das nyon mongs snying rje rje //
T02D2115:155b-32: gal te las kyi dbang btsan nas //
T02D2115:155b-33: shar gyi phyogs su skye srid do //
T02D2115:155b-34: shar kyi phyogs su skyes pa ni //
T02D2115:155b-35: de na skyob pa'i mgon po bzhugs //
T02D2115:155b-36: mgon po'i ming ni rnam snang mdzad //
T02D2115:155b-37: mgon po'i ming ni yul 'khor srung sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2115:155b-38: mgon po de la skyabs song cig / des phyogs 'og ma gsum 'gre'o /
T02D2115:155b-39: lhor rin 'byung mgon po'i ming ni 'phags skyes po //
T02D2115:155b-41: mgon po'i ming ni spyan mi bzang /
T02D2115:155b-42: byang sangs rgyas don yod grub pa //
T02D2115:155b-43: mgon po'i ming ni rnam thos sras //
T02D2115:155b-44: de nas tshe las 'das pa'i rig pa aa dkar po bsam /
T02D2115:155b-45: aa de 'jam dpal gyi thugs kar 'phang ngo //
T02D2115:155b-46: de nas byang bu mar me la bsreg / tha ma la s'atstsha gdab /
T02D2115:155b-47: tshe 'das pa'i don du smon lam rgya chen po gdab po //
T02D2115:156a-0: sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa 'bro lo ts'a ba dharm'a bhis bsgyur ba ro'i @156a * //
